statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT product_name, category, quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE unit_price > 100;
SELECT id, product_name, unit_price FROM inventory_tracking WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY quantity DESC, unit_price ASC;
SELECT id, category, quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity > 50 AND unit_price > 100 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, category, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_tracking GROUP BY category;
SELECT AVG(unit_price) AS avg_price, MAX(unit_price) AS max_price, MIN(unit_price) AS min_price FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT id, product_name, unit_price * quantity AS total_price FROM inventory_tracking WHERE unit_price * quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM seeds;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds ORDER BY seed_name ASC;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT seed_name, seed_id FROM seeds WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY seed_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM fertilizers ORDER BY fertilizer_name DESC;
SELECT seed_id, seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY seed_name DESC
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE seed_name LIKE 'A%' AND quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15
SELECT * FROM seeds JOIN fertilizers ON seeds.quantity = fertilizers.quantity
SELECT seed_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM seeds GROUP BY seed_name HAVING SUM(quantity) > 20
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE quantity IN (SELECT quantity FROM fertilizers WHERE quantity < 10)
SELECT * FROM seeds;
SELECT seed_id, seed_name FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM fertilizers ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT fertilizer_name, quantity FROM fertilizers WHERE fertilizer_name LIKE '%organic%';
SELECT input_name, quantity FROM agricultural_inputs WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY seed_name DESC
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE seed_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE seed_name LIKE '%corn%'
SELECT * FROM fertilizers WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY fertilizer_name
SELECT * FROM agricultural_inputs WHERE quantity BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM seeds
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT input_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM other_inputs WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM fertilizers WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT input_name, quantity, transaction_date FROM other_inputs JOIN inventory_tracking ON other_inputs.input_id = inventory_tracking.input_id WHERE transaction_type = 'IN'
SELECT seed_id, seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM fertilizers WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT input_id, input_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM other_inputs WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01' AND quantity > 0 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE transaction_type = 'INVENTORY_IN' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT tracking_id, input_id, quantity_changed, transaction_type FROM inventory_tracking WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY tracking_id;
SELECT * FROM seeds;
SELECT seed_name, quantity FROM seeds WHERE expiry_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT seed_id, seed_name, quantity FROM seeds ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM fertilizers WHERE quantity < 100;
SELECT fertilizer_name, quantity FROM fertilizers WHERE expiry_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM seeds WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY seed_name ASC;
SELECT seed_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM seeds WHERE expiry_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fertilizers WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY fertilizer_name DESC;
SELECT fertilizer_name, quantity FROM fertilizers WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT tool_name, quantity FROM tools WHERE tool_name LIKE '%harvest%';
